content: odd numbered row you are working with the front of the project facing you when working on odd row you are following the drawing from right to left all row should start with ch3 unless otherwise stated and at the beginning of each row pay attention to where the b colour should hang either to the front or the back as this will affect the drawing/pattern this is marked in the second column of the pattern also at the end of all b row the very last stitch is not followed by a chain 1 but you can make the chains for the start of next row the last column in the pattern table indicates how many windows you should have on that row the border the border is done one in each colour first colour b with colour b i used white for all on colour b windows 2sc in every window of the straight sides 5sc in each top corner the diagonal sides 8 windows on each side alternate 3sc and 2sc four times to end join to first single_crochet with an invisible join with colour a same as b border for all sides 5sc in each top corner grabbing the middle 3rd single_crochet of the colour b window the two bottom corners also have a stitch grabbed from the b border to end join to first single_crochet with an invisible join hope you enjoy this © astrid schandy 2025 aschandy@yahoo no heart bunting v 110 1 3 the action let s get started row nr chain b astrid s heart bunting w colour 1a chain 9 with a colour start in 5th chain from the hook dc1 ch1 sk1 x2 times double_crochet in 4 the last chain ch1 treble_crochet in the same last chain you should have 4 windows 1b chain 11 with b colour lay your chain over the trellis and on 5th chain from the hook 5 and through 1st colour a window b3 b1 ch1 trcf in your last chain note that row 2a to 9a start with a chain 4 remember as we increase the first stitch of the row goes in the base of the chain 4 not in the next available double_crochet 2a 4 b b1 f3 b1 trcf 6 2b 4 f1 b4 f1 trcb 7 3a 4 f f1 b5 f1 trcb 8 3b 4 b1 f6 b1 trcf 9 4a 4 b b1 f7 b1 trcf 10 4b 4 f1 b8 f1 trcb 11 5a 4 f f1 b9 f1 trcb 12 5b 4 b1 f10 b1 trcf 13 6a 4 b b1 f11 b1 trcf 14 6b 4 f1 b4 f4 b4 f1 trcb 15 7a 4 f f1 b4 9dcif b4 f1 trcb 16 7b 4 b1 f4 b6 f4 b1 trcf 17 8a 4 b b1 f4 5dcib f1 5dcib f4 b1 trcf 18 8b 4 f1 b4 f3 b2 f3 b4 f1 trcb 19 9a 4 f f1 b4 5dcif b3 5dcif b4 f1
